## TileLoader.waitSettled() method

Return the current state in form of a promise. Caller can then wait for the promise to be resolved.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
waitSettled(): Promise<TileLoaderState>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TileLoaderState](./harp-mapview.tileloaderstate.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A promise which resolves the current \[\[TileLoaderState\]\].
